snippet: The outrage is gone. Today, it’s rare to hear a complaint about shows like “Modern Family” or the drama “Smash,” which has five gay characters.
lead_paragraph: On ''Glee'' this spring, a transgender character named Unique is competing in a sing-off. On ''Grey's Anatomy,'' Arizona and Callie are adjusting to married life, having been pronounced ''wife and wife'' last year. On ''Modern Family,'' the nation's most popular television show, Cameron and his partner Mitchell are trying to adopt a second child.

headline.main: Gay on TV: It's All in the Family

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: SAME-SEX MARRIAGE, CIVIL UNIONS AND DOMESTIC PARTNERSHIPS
